# Choose Slim protocol
!define TEST_SYSTEM {slim}

!1 Simple Unary Tests
!|FEEL Simple Unary Tests Fixture                                                                                                       |
|inputEntry|output?                                                                                                                     |
|1         |SimplePositiveUnaryTests(OperatorTest(null,NumericLiteral(1)))                                                              |
|-1        |SimplePositiveUnaryTests(OperatorTest(null,ArithmeticNegation(NumericLiteral(1))))                                          |
|-a.b.c    |SimplePositiveUnaryTests(OperatorTest(null,ArithmeticNegation(PathExpression(PathExpression(Name(a), b), c))))              |
|1, 2      |SimplePositiveUnaryTests(OperatorTest(null,NumericLiteral(1)),OperatorTest(null,NumericLiteral(2)))                         |
|"e1", "e2"|SimplePositiveUnaryTests(OperatorTest(null,StringLiteral("e1")),OperatorTest(null,StringLiteral("e2")))                     |
|not (1, 2)|NegatedSimpleUnaryTests(SimplePositiveUnaryTests(OperatorTest(null,NumericLiteral(1)),OperatorTest(null,NumericLiteral(2))))|
|-         |Any()                                                                                                                       |
